summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: N3 No Name Necessary Mattifying Shine and Oil Control Long Lasting Anti-aging Makeup Setting Spray (200ml)
Review Date: 2019/09/14
Store: No Name Necessary
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.7 x 7.5 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
Review Text: This spray feels slightly like hairspray when you spritz it on. It helps makeup last all day and stay matte. I personally like a dewy finish so I spray this first for longevity, then when it dries I’ll spray a little dewy spray. Love the combo! Comes in a huge bottle that will last forever.
Review Title: Good spray for oily skin
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Catrice | SUNGASM Luminizing Bronzer 01 | For A Sun-Kissed Shimmery Finish | Highly Pigmented & Blendable | Vegan, Paraben Free, Oil Free | Cruelty Free
Review Date: 2020/08/06
Store: Catrice
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Brand': 'Catrice', 'Color': 'C01 Golden Ecstasy', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Product Dimensions': '2.72 x 2.72 x 0.51 inches; 1.27 Ounces'}
Review Text: This bronzer is really pretty, it's not matte but not glittery. It has the perfect amount of shimmer/sheen that makes your skin look healthy and glowy. Perfect for summer. It blends out beautifully on my skin and looks like I have a natural tan. I have fair skin and the 01 shade doesn't pull too orange or too red on me.
Review Title: So beautiful!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bouquet Garni Body Shower White Musk - Unique Fragrance Decanting Engineering Method gives Long Lasting Rich Fragrance - Gentle and Mild Cleansing Scented Body Wash with Natural Surfactant 17.85 Fl Oz
Review Date: 2020/11/11
Store: Bouquet Garni
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bouquet Garni', 'Scent': 'Garni', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 6.34 x 3.66 inches; 1.34 Pounds'}
Review Text: This body wash lathers nicely and has a pleasant, musky scent. I find I need about 3-4 pumps to wash my whole body. It came in a really nice box that would make a cute gift. I wish it had a little bit more vanilla scent to it.
Review Title: Lathers nice!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Sweat Cosmetics Foundation Powder Jar SPF 30 Water + Sweat Resistant (Shade 100: light)
Review Date: 2021/03/14
Store: SWEAT FOR ACTIVE BEAUTY
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Package Information': 'Jar', 'Brand': 'SWEAT FOR ACTIVE BEAUTY', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '2.8 x 2.8 x 1.4 inches; 0.63 Ounces'}
Review Text: This powder is nice enough, but it doesn't blow me away so much that I can justify spending almost $50 for a jar of powder. I have dry skin and powder often makes me look cakey, this sits on my skin nicely and doesn't look too thick or powdery. I would say this has light to medium coverage. The shade I received is 100 light, it pulls too yellow/orange on me, I wish it had a more neutral undertone. I like that it has SPF 30 and is water/sweat resistant, I will probably get a lot more use out of this in the summer than in the winter. Overall, this is a decent product but I have several other loose powder foundations that I like just as much that are a fraction of this price.
Review Title: Expensive powder
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Winky Lux Orchid Gelee Serum | Skin Brightening Serum | Hydrating Serum with Hyaluronic Acid & Ogliopeptide (30 mL / 1 fl. oz)
Review Date: 2021/03/14
Store: Winky Lux
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Anti-Aging', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Winky Lux', 'Package Dimensions': '6.34 x 1.26 x 1.18 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '818324025131'}
Review Text: The packaging on this serum is stunning! The petals floating in the bottle are absolutely beautiful. This serum blends out nicely on my skin, it feels slightly sticky/tacky to the touch after applying but doesn't feel uncomfortable at all. The petals dissolve as you rub it around. This does a great job of moisturizing my very dry skin.
Review Title: Hydrating but slightly sticky serum
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: REALHER Cheek Trio - Ultimate Glow Getter - Blush, Highlighter, & Bronzer Contour Palette - High Quality, Silky Formulation
Review Date: 2021/04/07
Store: RealHer
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 2.56 x 0.67 inches; 3.25 Ounces'}
Review Text: This face palette is so pretty—the blush is the perfect shade for my light/fair skin and blends out beautifully. The blush is not super pigmented, but I prefer my blushes to be blendable so they look more natural. The gold highlighter is gorgeous, it is not glittery but more of a shimmer. It is buildable, so you can make it look natural or blinding. The contour/bronzer is probably my least favorite part of the palette but I still like it. It was a little difficult to blend, it blends out best with a big, fluffy brush. The shade is somewhere between a contour and bronzer, it’s a little too warm for my skin to be used as a contour so I blend it out more like a bronzer. I have really been enjoying this palette lately and have been reaching for it often ever since I received it!
Review Title: Beautiful face palette
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Key Preferences and Patterns:**

- **Skincare and Makeup Focus**: Strong interest in products aimed at **matte finishes**, **longevity**, and **hydration**, with a preference for items that can maintain a **natural look**.
  
- **Shade Compatibility**: Emphasis on lighter shades, as well as avoiding overly warm tones, indicating a tendency towards products that work well with **fair skin**.

- **Product Texture**: Preference for products with **blendable** formulas that don't feel heavy or cakey, showing a desire for **natural skin appearance**.

- **Versatility and Combination Use**: Frequent mention of layering products for desired effects (e.g., combining sprays), indicating experimentation with **makeup techniques** for optimal results.

- **Fragrance Consideration**: Appreciation for **pleasant scents** in body washes, suggesting that sensory experience is important in selections.

- **Value Sensitivity**: Critical view on **high price points**, particularly for foundations, suggesting a preference for **cost-effective** options.

- **Hydration Importance**: Repeated mentions of **moisturizing** properties, underscoring a need for hydrating products, especially given the presence of dry skin concerns.

Overall, the behavior illustrates a consumer with a preference for effective, natural-looking makeup and a keen eye on product longevity, hydration, and cost-effectiveness, while maintaining a notable appreciation for blendability and scent.

target_interaction.title: Great under eye powder
target_interaction.text: I have been using this powder to set my under eyes and it is fantastic! This powder blurs and reduces the appearance of dark circles without looking too powdery. It feels lightweight and isn’t drying. It comes with a little powder puff too.
target_interaction.title_meta: By Terry Hyaluronic Pressed Hydra-Powder | Transcluscent | Infused with Hyaluronic Acid | Vegan

videos.title: Powder melts right into your skin
By Terry Hyaluronic Global Face Cream
